summary: Emma, a blind violinist who had recently undergone a revolutionary surgery, joins with a police detective to track a serial killer after she was an inadvertent witness to his latest crime.
cast: Madeleine Stowe|Aidan Quinn|James Remar|Peter Friedman|Bruce A. Young|Laurie Metcalf|Matt Roth|Paul Dillon|Michael P. Crawford|Mark Nagel|Les Podewell|Lucina Paquet|Glendon Gabbard|Gene Janson|Renee Lockett-Lawson|Mary Seibel|Valerie Spencer|Kathryn Miller|Donna Alexander|Jackie Samuel|Kevin Swerdlow|Kevin Matthews|Ted Gilbert|Chantal Wentworth|Joe McConnell|Bob Lanier|Ray Clay|Louie|Michael Kirkpatrick|Suzy Brack|Caryn Cheever|Ed Cray|Michael Jordan|Frances Lira
title: Sola en la penumbra
